version_description:
- improved support for iPhone X, iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max
- correction of problems with touch processing on some devices
- minor changes and improvements

- improved support for iPhone X, iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max
- correction of problems with touch processing on some devices
- minor changes and improvements

- correction of problems with touch processing on some devices
- minor changes and improvements

- correction of problems with touch processing on some devices
- minor changes and improvements

- shadows support added
- increased frame rate in the menus
- minor changes and improvements

- shadows support added
- increased frame rate in the menus
- minor changes and improvements

- shadows support added
- increased frame rate in the menus
- minor changes and improvements

- shadows support added
- increased frame rate in the menus
- minor changes and improvements

After installing this update all the players who completed the main campaign will get access to the New Game + mode which includes:
- new monsters;
- new weapons and armor;
- difficulty levels for each mission;
- new character upgrade branch.
Important! Activating New game + will reset your mission progress. You will keep all the weapons, equipment and character progress.

Happy playing,
your Sigma Team.

- fixed the disappearance of light sources at high magnification
- correction of shadow projection from some object types
- shadows draw optimization
- some objects are refined to reduce the likelihood to be stuck
- minor changes and improvements

- dynamic camera option added in game settings
- reworked shotgun ability now deals damage over a large area
- reduced damage from a monster spitting clouds of acid
- minor changes and improvements

- fixed bug with camera shaking on some missions
- improved dynamic camera logic
- fixed a bug in the "Shock Wave" skill
- fixed problems in detecting energy weapon hits
- energy weapon rebalanced
- fixed errors in the texts
- fixed character getting stuck on some missions
- fixed a dialog that doesn't work when finding a cache on a Mission 36
